caption: This is a mystery story about a vehicle and a museum. The protagonist discovers a strange vehicle and, through investigation, finds out it's a decoy, with passengers who have recently been murdered. He and his friend unravel this mystery and ultimately discover that this is a well-planned murder case. Highlighted points include: the protagonist discovering a peculiar vehicle, investigation revealing it's fake and that passengers on it were recently murdered; the protagonist and his friend solving the mystery, revealing it to be a well-planned murder involving the museum and a train. Ultimately, it was exposed to be a meticulously organized homicide.
